input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: Show Off Your Team Spirit, While Keeping Warm, In The Delay Of Game Track Jacket By Majestic. Now, You Can Protect Yourself From The Elements, And Keep Looking Like Your Favorite Mlb Team'S Style MVP. Pouch Pockets Keeps Hands Warm For All 9 Innings And Beyond.
input_text.Response B: This version of the Bliss pump and stiletto from Pleaser will charm everyone that you come near. Its sculpted silhouette and tall heel and platform add a sexy appeal to anything you have on, especially as it lengthens your legs. The glossy upper and adjustable strap add a certain edginess to any occasion. Stiletto Heel Height: Approx. 4 1/4'' Tall. Mini platform pumps Heel Height: Approx 3/4". D'Orsay Style. Heels are made of 100% synthetic material with Leopard print pony hair on the outer portion of the heel. Shoes run approximately 1/2 size small.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A has errors in it, Response B relates to a completely different product
